question:
You are going to another country to study. You would like to do a part-time job while your are studying, so you want to ask a friend who lives there for some help.
Write a letter to this fiend. In your letter:
-give details of your study plans
-explain why you want to get a part-time job
-suggest how your friend could help you find a job
text: I hope you are pink in your health. I am writing this letter to inform you that I get admission to ABC University in Toronto.

As you know that mere I have completed my graduation in Civil Engineering from Delhi University. Hence, recently I made a plan to continue my study thus, I had apply for postgraduation in the same stream consequently, last Friday, I got the confirmation letter from the University.

I would like to tell you that my family's financial condition is not well due to the corona pandemic therefore, to survive in ,Canada I ought to do any part-time work so that, I can collect my next year's fee as well as to full fill my basic requirements there.

You have been living here for the last 5 years, I hope it will be straightforward for you to help me to find a relevant job related to my previous study. I have attached my updated resume with this letter as together as sent on your email id.
I am looking forward to your positive response
